"Design a customizable clothes hanger that allows users to create their own unique design using interchangeable parts such as hooks, clips, and labels."
"Create a smart clothes hanger that uses sensors to detect when clothes are dry and automatically hangs them up in the closet."
"Develop a foldable clothes hanger that can be easily stored away when not in use, taking up minimal space in the closet."
"Create a clothes hanger that doubles as a lamp, providing additional lighting in the closet."
"Design a clothes hanger that is made from sustainable materials such as bamboo or recycled plastic, reducing waste and promoting eco-friendliness."
